2.0.3.description: New Quality-Of-Life additions and changes in data-loading logic to improve performance and overall stability
added: Alerts filtered by type and paginated
Clicking on Upcoming shift card on Dashboard will now redirect to detailed shift information
Enhanced background logic for safe and optimized data loading
Added language dropdown to navbar for both desktop and mobiles

fixed: Smaller issues with switching UI languages

2.0.1.description: Fix small UI issues and minor tweaks
added: Clicking on any train number will now redirect to the train in train search
removed: UI theme switching due to it's buggy behavior
